name: Serotunein
0:
”Alexa, open Sero Tunein”
”Alexa, ask Sero Tunein for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start Sero Tunein”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sero tunein
des:
Listen to the latest epidose of serotunein to tune your emotions and build a sustainable mindset. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".

Visit the website: www.serotunein.weebly.com
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
